body_html:
It got worse. Before, if I deleted/recloned the repo and tried again, it would compile. Now it always fails.

root@machine-learning:/vagrant/packages/tensorflow# bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
INFO: Waiting for response from Bazel server (pid 17980)...
ERROR: no such package '@local_config_cuda//crosstool': BUILD file not found on package path.
ERROR: no such package '@local_config_cuda//crosstool': BUILD file not found on package path.
INFO: Elapsed time: 8.671s

# git rev-parse HEAD
warning: refname 'HEAD' is ambiguous.
1cb04a68d24187d4d02689e2bc8aba9b7abee154

root@machine-learning:/vagrant/packages/tensorflow# ls *bazel*
ls: cannot access '*bazel*': No such file or directory
root@machine-learning:/vagrant/packages/tensorflow# ls -l $(bazel info output_base)/external/local_config_cuda/crosstool
ls: cannot access '/root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/b0bb79a433b74dfa52314ef9af1d2ddd/external/local_config_cuda/crosstool': No such file or directory
root@machine-learning:/vagrant/packages/tensorflow# tree $(bazel info output_base)/external/local_config_cuda          
/root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/b0bb79a433b74dfa52314ef9af1d2ddd/external/local_config_cuda
|-- cuda
|   |-- BUILD
|   |-- build_defs.bzl
|   |-- cuda_config.h
|   |-- extras
|   |   `-- CUPTI
|   |       |-- include
|   |       |   `-- cupti.h
|   |       `-- lib64
|   |           `-- libcupti.so
|   |-- include
|   |   |-- cublas.h
|   |   |-- cuda.h
|   |   `-- cudnn.h
|   |-- lib64
|   |   |-- libcublas.so
|   |   |-- libcudart.so
|   |   |-- libcudart_static.a
|   |   |-- libcudnn.so
|   |   |-- libcufft.so
|   |   `-- libcurand.so
|   `-- platform.bzl
`-- WORKSPACE

body:
It got worse. Before, if I deleted/recloned the repo and tried again, it would compile. Now it always fails.

```
root@machine-learning:/vagrant/packages/tensorflow# bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
INFO: Waiting for response from Bazel server (pid 17980)...
ERROR: no such package '@local_config_cuda//crosstool': BUILD file not found on package path.
ERROR: no such package '@local_config_cuda//crosstool': BUILD file not found on package path.
INFO: Elapsed time: 8.671s
```

```
# git rev-parse HEAD
warning: refname 'HEAD' is ambiguous.
1cb04a68d24187d4d02689e2bc8aba9b7abee154
```
